title: The bookmarks (ctrl B) no longer directly accessible
content:
Hello there,

Before (an update perhaps?), it was possible to click on a star icon located in the toolbar and it'd open the bookmarks like the bookmarks1 screenshot. Now, it requires to first click on the sidebar thingy, which allows to access the icons on the far right, which includes the bookmarks icon in question.

There's also another icon for bookmarks that can be put directly in the toolbar (bookmarks2 pic), yes, but it doesn't show all the bookmarks right away, it's not the same

So the question is: how do I do to get the Ctrl B Icon/shortcut directly in the toolbar, like it was before? I don't want to be obligated to use the sidebar when I have plenty of space left in the standard toolbar..

Thanks in advance!
creator: magmaster69

title: Final submit button doesn't work at end of customer journey
content:
I have had this problem for many years now. When I complete a customer journey on some sites, usually with a payment involved, the final submit button doesn't work at all, and I have to redo the transaction on Chrome.

This happened yesterday on Ryanair's site and, by the time I gave up and redid the journey on Chrome, certain prices went up. So, now I'm losing money :-(

Firefox has been my default browser for a decade or more, despite my husband's teasing me about this issue, but I might have to give up and make the switch to Chrome or Edge. Please help!

Please note that Firefox clears my cookies every time I close my browser.

Thanks!

title: Saved payments won't autofill or allow me to edit them
content:
Hi, my autofill payments appear as a list when I attempt payments on websites, however, when I click on the credit card I want to use, it won't autofill. This just started happening in the last few months. It worked fine until it didn't. It's happening on all my autofill payments, so I'm unable to use them and now have to enter everything manually.

I tried to go into Firefox Privacy/Security and edit them to check if they needed additional info, but when I click "edit", nothing happens. Won't allow me to edit them either.
creator: fuzzymmm

title: Two Issues, Not Sure If They're Connected
content:
So I've been having two different but equally annoying issues with Firefox for a while (I know it's Firefox itself because other browsers and my internet connection in general is fine).

One: After my computer has been rebooted, all websites forget my device/act like this is a new device and log me out. I have to go through logging back in and also confirming it's me for certain things every time there's a restart.

Two: It doesn't happen immediately after the computer has been restarted, but eventually things load very sluggishly and even stop loading altogether, off and on, like I am having internet issues/disconnection.

Could these things be connected or am I just having two separate, annoying things happening at the same time? Thanks for the help.
creator: kebailey1988

title: Pick and Black Color issue on OLED monitor when tab is fullscreen on Mozzilla Firefox
content:
Hello,

When using Youtube on Mozilla Firefox I notice a weird color issue where parts of a video will have a weird pink and black color distortion. I've only noticed it happening on my OLED monitor and not on my secondary IPS monitor. I tried Google Chrome and it doesn't happen on that browser. Also it seems to not have any color issues when my tab isn't in fullscreen but when I full screen it the color distortion happens. It doesn't seem like I can capture a screenshot of it as it looks normal on my IPS monitor but I can still see the color distortion in my screenshot on my OLED monitor. I am currently using a ViewSonic XG272-2K-OLED 27.0 monitor. I checked my monitor settings as well and nothing seems to work. Just wanted to check and see if you guys had any suggestions to help with this
creator: goslanabeel
